lead_paragraph: Leon Draisaitl, Anton Lander and Brandon Davidson all scored in the third period for Edmonton, helping the Oilers snap a seven-game losing streak with a 3-1 victory over the New York Islanders on Sunday night.

headline.print_headline: Oilers Score 3 Times in Third, Top Islanders 3-1
headline.main: Oilers Score 3 Times in Third, Top Islanders 3-1
